name: Large Mouth Bass
description: Dark olive green on the back with light green sides shading to a white belly.

name: Walleye
description: Primarily gold and olive in color, with a white belly.

name: Trout
description: Trout have fins entirely without spines, and all of them have a small adipose fin along the back, near the tail.

name: Trout
description: Trout have fins entirely without spines, and all of them have a small adipose fin along the back, near the tail.

name: Crappie
description: Usually silvery-gray to green in color and show irregular or mottled black splotches over the entire body.

name: Seabass
description: An elongated body shape, large head and mouth, tight scales, and a broad, fork-less tail.

name: Goldfish
description: Have two sets of paired fins and three sets of single fins.

name: Comet
description: They have a long, flowing, forked tail and are gold or orange in color, and can sometimes have black markings.

name: Oranda
description: A breed of goldfish characterized by a prominent bubble-like hood on the head.

name: Shubunkin
description: Are a straight tailed, iridescent scaled goldfish

name: Mosquito Fish
description: Small in comparison to many other freshwater fish

name: Sunfish
description: from the family Molidae and are the largest bony fish in the world.

name: Catfish
description: Their whisker-like barbels, which are located on the nose, each side of the mouth, and on the chin.

name: Koi
description: Colorful, ornamental versions of the common carp.
